doc.title: Tong Siew: Oyster Omelette got two types
doc.text: You/PRP know/VBP there/RB are/VBP two/CD types/NNS of/IN Oyster/NN Omelettes/NN right/NN ?/. There/EX is/VBZ Orh/RB Jian/JJ or/CC Orh/JJ Luak/NN which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT type/NN where/RB a/DT sticky/JJ starch/NN is/VBZ added/VBD to/TO the/DT eggs/NN to/TO make/VB it/PRP sticky/NN and/CC crispy/NN ,/, and/CC there/RB is/VBZ Orh/JJ Nerng/NN which/WDT is/VBZ omelette/JJ without/IN the/DT starch/NN ./. The/DT beauty/NN of/IN the/DT Orh/NN Luak/NN is/VBZ the/DT fact/NN that/IN the/DT starch/NN adds/VBZ a/DT sticky/JJ and/CC crisp/JJ contrast/NN to/TO the/DT oyster/NN ./. On/JJ the/DT other/JJ hand/NN ,/, with/IN the/DT Orh/NN Nerng/NN ,/, you/PRP get/VB to/TO enjoy/VB the/DT taste/NN of/IN the/DT fluffy/JJ ,/, tender/JJ eggs/NN with/IN the/DT oysters/NN which/WDT is/VBZ also/RB very/RB shiok/JJ ./. If/IN you/PRP are/VBP at/IN Pek/NN Kio/NN to/TO eat/VB the/DT Wah/NNP Kee/NNP Prawn/NNP Noodles/NNP ,/, you/PRP ca/MD n't/RB miss/VB this/DT stall/NN as/IN it/PRP has/VBZ a/DT prominent/JJ sign/NN stating/NN that/WDT their/PRP$ fried/VBD rice/NN is/VBZ only/RB $/$ 2/CD ./. The/DT fried/VBD rice/NN is/VBZ a/DT bit/NN dry/JJ ,/, but/CC I/PRP guess/VB if/IN you/PRP only/RB have/VBN $/$ 2/CD in/IN your/PRP$ pocket/NN ,/, you/PRP could/MD try/VB it/PRP ./. But/CC if/IN you/PRP have/VBP $/$ 4/CD ,/, then/RB you/PRP would/MD be/VB pleasantly/RB surprised/VBD by/IN the/DT Oyster/NN Omelette/NN ./. It/PRP 's/VBZ a/DT rather/RB straightforward/JJ dish/NN and/CC is/VBZ essentially/RB a/DT plain/NN omelette/NN that/WDT is/VBZ topped/VBD with/IN oysters/NN which/WDT have/VB been/VBN fried/VBD with/IN a/DT rather/RB nice/JJ chilli/NN paste/NN ./. Not/RB many/JJ places/NNS actually/RB make/VB them/PRP this/DT way/NN ./. Its/PRP not/RB too/RB oily/JJ ,/, unlike/IN the/DT usual/JJ Orh/NN Jian/NN and/CC is/VBZ a/DT nice/JJ little/JJ side/NN dish/NN to/TO order/VB ./. According/VBG to/TO the/DT owner/NN of/IN this/DT place/NN ,/, they/PRP used/VBD to/TO be/VB much/RB bigger/JJR and/CC pretty/RB well/RB known/VBN while/IN they/PRP were/VBD at/IN Bugis/NN St./. But/CC since/IN the/DT cleaning/NN up/NN of/IN Bugis/NN ,/, they/PRP had/VBD relocated/RB several/JJ times/NNS before/IN settling/VBG in/IN Pek/NNP Kio/NNP ./. Perhaps/RB some/JJ of/IN our/PRP$ readers/NNS can/MD elaborate/VB a/DT little/JJ more/NN about/IN their/PRP$ history/NN ?/. Do/VBP n't/RB you/PRP think/VB that/WDT fried/VBD eggs/NNS are/VBP nice/JJ ?/. They/PRP are/VBP seriously/RB underrated/JJ ./. A/DT fluffy/JJ egg/NN omelette/NN served/VBD with/IN just/RB a/DT simple/JJ chilli/NN sauce/NN can/MD be/VB quite/RB an/DT easy/JJ treat/NN ./. Add/DT some/JJ oysters/NN and/CC you/PRP 've/VBP got/VBN something/NN that/WDT can/MD really/RB hit/VB the/DT Umami/JJ Spot/NN !/.
